channel.title: Blog on zoeyzding
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on zoeyzding

item.title: How to update this blog (built with Hugo & GitHub Pages)
item.description: #1 Write a post Open cmd，cd to hugo blog local folder。 hugo new posts/"new post.md" Open “new post”. Start wrting by using a markdown editor (recommended). #2 Preview hugo server -D Make sure everything works fine. Change draft:true to draft:false in the metadata section of the post. #3 Git update Run hugo hugo Go to “public” folder, push to GitHub. cd public git add . git commit -m "xxxxx" (git pull) git push Go to the blog url to see the final result.
